name: MileStep, LLC
description:
MileStep team is a software development company. We provide full-stack engineers who work with bot dedicated team and staff augmentation models. Cooperating with your in-house staff, we develop and launch mobile and web app as well as solve every issues which might be occured in your current project.

As a single-minded team, we target on pursuing your goals, rather than just writing a code. Thus, all of us finds it important to wrap mind around concept of the project before we start writing clean code. Putting this approach with agile methodologies together, Milestep offers prospects of going beyond your Client's expectations.
Our technology stack:
Ruby on Rails/ Ionic/ React/ Electron/ Angular/Vue.js/ TypeScript/ EmberJS/ BackboneJS/ NodeJS/ CoffeeScript/ jQuery /Sass/ Less/ MySQL /Redux/ PostgreSQL/ MongoDB
Our company offers the most flexible decisions, so you can contact us if you have start-up project or high growth firm. Also, we work equally with B2B, B2C and nonprofit organizations bеcause we have a database of full-stack developers with different stack technologies. So, let’s grow your business together!
